howItWorks.title: How does AgriChain work?
howItWorks.subtitle: The platform connects investors and farmers for transparent and profitable investments in the agricultural sector.

investorSteps.title: Create an account
investorSteps.desc: Register as an investor on the AgriChain platform.

investorSteps.title: Publish a lot
investorSteps.desc: Create an application specifying what you are ready to invest in.

investorSteps.title: Auction
investorSteps.desc: Farmers apply, you select the best candidates.

investorSteps.title: Contract
investorSteps.desc: Sign a smart contract with the selected farmer.

farmerSteps.title: Create an account
farmerSteps.desc: Register as a farmer on the AgriChain platform.

farmerSteps.title: Apply for a lot
farmerSteps.desc: Choose a lot and offer your candidacy.

farmerSteps.title: Results
farmerSteps.desc: Find out the auction results and get feedback.

farmerSteps.title: Contract
farmerSteps.desc: Sign a smart contract with the investor.

farmerSteps.title: Receive investments
farmerSteps.desc: Get funds and develop your enterprise.

farmerSteps.title: Pay dividends
farmerSteps.desc: Pay dividends to the investor after the project is completed.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you wanted to know about the AgriChain platform

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: AgriChain supports payments via PayPal and Solana Pay. Choose your preferred method when investing in projects.

items.question: How to invest in agro-projects?
items.answer: Go to the Investments section, select a lot you are interested in and click Invest. Choose a payment method: PayPal or Solana Pay.

items.question: How can a farmer post an investment lot?
items.answer: After registering as a farmer, fill out the Create Investment Lot form on the investments page. Specify the amount, type, and description of the project.

items.question: Are my funds safe?
items.answer: All transactions go through the blockchain and are protected by modern technologies. Information about your investments is always available in your personal account.

items.question: How to contact support?
items.answer: You can email us at support@agrichain.kz or in Telegram.

footer.slogan: Transparent investments in the agricultural sector on blockchain. Support farmers ‚Äî invest in the future!
